page.title: 14Gymnastics For Leisure
page.content: The name of my{Gymnastics}Club is Bridgefield Forum, Halewood which is by the Baths. The club meets on a Friday night and we practice for the B.A.G.A.{Gymnastics Awards.}The Little ones that are on Badge 4 practice from 7.30 p.m. to 8.30 p.m. and the bigger ones that are on Badges 3, 2, and 1 practice from 8.30 p.m. to 9.30 p.m. You have to pay 50p to get into the club. If you go on a{Friday}you can also go on a{Saturday}morning from 9.30 a .m. to 12.00 noon and you still only pay 50p. The Gymnastics coaches are Lilian and Ann and there is a helper named Joanne. CLAIRE MARSHALL (9).
